Package ca.caro.assetmanagement.database

Class Report

java.lang.Object
ca.caro.assetmanagement.database.Report
public class Report
extends java.lang.Object
Report Class

Class that handles the calculation of depreciation. 2 types of calculation Basic and Custom

  • Method Details

    • calcDepreciation

      public static double calcDepreciation​(java.lang.String asset_id, java.lang.String deprec_info_id)
      This method takes Asset ID and Depreciation ID and calculate the Depreciated Cost
      Parameters:
      asset_id - String Asset ID for the Asset that will be calculated for a depreciated cost
      deprec_info_id - String Depreciation ID for the Depreciation that will be used for calculating the Asset's Depreciated Cost
      Returns:
      double Returns the depreciated cost value

    • retrieveVar

      private static java.lang.String retrieveVar​(java.lang.String asset_id, java.lang.String varName)
      This method retrieves an asset value according to passed variable
      Parameters:
      asset_id - String Asset ID of the asset that the value will be retrieved from
      varName - String The target variable's name
      Returns:
      String Returns value of an asset parameter from the database

      Parameters:

      options - String[] parse option
      Returns:
      double Returns parsed value

      Parameters:
      deprec_info_id - String Depreciation ID for the Depreciation that will be checked
